Reading List

Since last year, I've been focusing on reading books and I'll be listing them here to keep myself motivated. The goal is to read at least a book per month, but I've been pushing myself to read a book every two weeks. I tend to read non technical stuff and I'm open for recomendations.
Currently Reading
  •  A mind for numbers, by Barbara Oakley
  •  Investimentos Inteligentes, by Gustavo Cerbasi
  •  Unlimited Power, by Tony Robbins
2018
  1.  Outliers, by Malcom Gladwell
  2.  Rework, by Jason Fried, David Heinemeier Hansson
  3.  Alice in Wonderland, by Lewis Carroll
  4.  Outliers, by Malcom Gladwell
  5.  O homem que calculava, by Malba Tahan
2017
  1.  The 4 Hour Wookweek, by Tim Ferris
  2.  The Goal, by Eliyahu M. Goldratt
  3.  Como Organizar Sua Vida Financeira, by Gustavo Cerbasi
  4.  Por que fazemos o que fazemos, by Mario Sergio Cortella
  5.  Abundance, by Peter Diamandis
  6.  Start With Why, by Simon Sinek
  7.  Sonho Grande, by Cristiane Correa
2016
  1.  Ponto de Impacto,by Dan Brown
  2.  Fortaleza Digital, by Dan Brown
